sentence.Network_en: This painting is by a copyist.
sentence.Network_cn: 这幅画出自临模家之手.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... chemist 化学家 copyist 抄写员 motorist 驾驶汽车者.
自从苹果首次起诉三星侵犯专利时开始，苹果就用“模仿者(copyist)”这个词来形容三星公司，苹果认为三星的Galaxy设备“赤裸裸”的抄 …
录_百度百科 ... ◎ 录声[ record] ◎ 录事[ copyist;an office clerk] ◎ 录像[ videotape;videorecord;be recorded on film].
抄谱员（copyist），负责将最后审定的总谱再抄写一遍，再拿去录音。本片中出现的配乐和音乐当是有上述不同角色之间的一些分工…

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from copy + -ist; replacing earlier copist, from French copiste or medieval Latin copista, from copiare 'to copy', from copia (see copy)

entry.tran: 临摹者;(过去的)誊写员，抄写员
entry.def: A copyist copies other people's music or paintings or, in the past, made written copies of documents.

example.ex: She copies the true artist's signature as part of a painting, as do most copyists.
example.tran: 像大多数临摹者一样，她也把原画家的签名临摹到画上。

means.word_mean: 1. someone employed to make written copies of documents and manuscripts
